sections.heading: Sealed container defense in product liability
sections.text:
(a) In this section, the following words have the meanings indicated:(1) a. “Manufacturer” means a designer, assembler, fabricator, constructor, compounder, producer or processor of any product or its component parts.b. “Manufacturer” includes an entity
